divs: sighting detailsthis occured while i was driving south to i-94 through the waterloo rec area, and just a few miles before the freeway, while traveling east about to turn south just after 11pm. i first disregarded the extremely bright object as i initially thought "radio tower light". i then noticed it changed direction abrubtly to the south leaving behind a slight streak of orange\fiery light before randomly pulsating in intensity. i witnessed this for just a few moments, then it returned near its original position very quickly and gained altitude. very quickly it darted off into the north\northeast so fast that it was almost instantaneously. i am reporting this because i saw another sighting of a similar sounding object just east of where i saw this one posted on this website and it literally made me flush white and feel sick when i read the report. the waterloo rec. area will have my eyes in the sky from now on when driving through there.
